capabilities.name: analyze_existing_docs
capabilities.description: Analyze existing documentation files with enhanced content analysis and metadata generation

capabilities.name: analyze_project_with_metadata
capabilities.description: Analyze project structure, create initial documentation files, and enhance with metadata/context

capabilities.name: analyze_project
capabilities.description: Analyze project structure and create initial documentation files

capabilities.name: read_doc
capabilities.description: Read a documentation file (required before updating)

capabilities.name: update_doc
capabilities.description: Update a specific documentation file using diff-based changes

capabilities.name: get_doc_content
capabilities.description: Get the current content of a documentation file

capabilities.name: get_project_info
capabilities.description: Get information about the project structure and files

capabilities.name: search_docs
capabilities.description: Search across documentation files with highlighted results

capabilities.name: update_metadata
capabilities.description: Update metadata for a documentation file

capabilities.name: get_related_docs
capabilities.description: Find related documentation files based on metadata

capabilities.name: customize_template
capabilities.description: Create or update a custom documentation template
